text: Asad Qaiser (; born 15 November 1969) is a Pakistani politician. He was the Speaker of the National Assembly of Pakistan, in office from August 2018 to April 2022. He has been a member of the National Assembly of Pakistan, since August 2018. In April 2020, Qaiser tested positive for COVID-19 during the coronavirus pandemic in Pakistan. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Speakers of the National Assembly of Pakistan Category:Politicians from Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Asad Qaiser
